snippet: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, the sprawling fantasy role-playing adventure from Bethesda Softworks, won the Big Apple Award for Best Game from the New York Videogame Critics Circle, which announced its first annual prizes on Thursday evening.
abstract: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, the sprawling fantasy role-playing adventure from Bethesda Softworks, won the Big Apple Award for Best Game from the New York Videogame Critics Circle, which announced its first annual prizes on Thursday evening.

headline.main: Skyrim Wins Video Game Critics Award
headline.print_headline: New York Critics Pick Top Games
